author: Principal Correspondent
text:
Four model polling booths are to be set up in each assembly constituency in the forthcoming assembly election, said District Collector-cum-District Election Officer A.Gnanasekaran.

He said that the model booths would have all basic amenities. “We are yet to identify booths that should be made model ones. We are in the process”.

All the polling booths will have ramps for differently-abled and we are preparing to arrange tricycles for each booth. We would also be recruiting volunteers to operate the tricycle, he said.

Mallavadi Rehabilitation Centre for Leprosy patients would have an exclusive booth for the 200 odd inmates and the doctors taking care of them would be polling officers, he added. Each of the eight assembly constituencies would have three static surveillance teams and three flying squads with vehicles.
title: 4 model booths to come up in each constituency
